series_description: This series consists of administrative hearings in accordance with procedures set up in
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after last action, then transfer to Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 5 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 10 years.

series_description: This series consists of the agency's audits of licensees as authorized by
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after last action, then transfer to Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 3 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 8 years.
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, § 18.2-340.31. Licensees to be audited are selected at random or for cause. Up to 10 % of licensees are audited in any particular year. Series includes audit reports, findings, exhibits, attachments and other supporting documentation.

series_title: Index to Licensees This series is a database that acts as a quick reference guide to licensees in a database of Charitable Gaming Commission (CGC) file numbers. Database cross references licensee names, file numbers and file locations.
retention_statement: Purge licensee data 10 years after license expiration, Delete data in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of an electronic copy of the financial reports that licensees are required to submit by
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after the end of the CGC file year, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, § 18.2-340.30. Series is extracted from "Supporting Documents File", record series 005394. The reports, less most attachments and supporting documentation are initially scanned into an electronic database for ease of use and multiple access, then retained after hard copy records are destroyed as the copy of record.

series_description: This series consists of an electronic copy of complaint or incident reports. Reports are received from the general public, special agents and/or information extracted from inspection or audit reports. Series is extracted from "Supporting Documents File", record series 005396. The reports, less most attachments and supporting documentation are initially scanned into an electronic database for ease of use and multiple access, then retained after hard copy records are destroyed as the copy of record.
retention_statement: Retain 20 years after the end of the CGC file year, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of the routine or for cause inspection of licensees as authorized by
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after the end of the CGC file year, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of investigation of licensees as authorized by
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after last action, then transfer to Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 7 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 10 years.
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, § 18.2-340.18. This series includes complaints, investigation reports, attachments, findings, recommendations and any related correspondence.

series_title: Licensing Files , Charitable Organizations – Record Copy
series_description: This series consists of an electronic copy of charitable gaming license applications. Series is extracted from "Supporting Documents File", record series 005400. The reports, less most attachments and supporting documentation are initially scanned into an electronic database for ease of use and multiple access, then retained after hard copy records are destroyed as the copy of record.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after the end of the CGC file year, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.
